title: Halloween and the Occult - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/1/19
itunes:title: Halloween and the Occult - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/1/19
description:
George Noory and esoteric researcher Mitch Horowitz explore the petition to move the date of Halloween to October 31, as well as his views on witches and ouija boards.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
